query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_recipients (
  recipient_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_email (email),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_recipients (
  recipient_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_email (email),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active)
)
